description:
Join a prestigious organization at the forefront of California legal information and guidance. Continuing Education of the Bar (CEB) is dedicated to advancing the rule of law in California through comprehensive legal resources and practical insights.

Position Summary

Reporting to the Sales Manager, the Account Executive will drive new sales within assigned territories. Utilizing a consultative sales approach, you will identify client needs and demonstrate the value of CEB's products and solutions. This role offers remote flexibility with occasional travel for company meetings, tradeshows, or conferences.

Preferred Time Zone: Pacific Time Zone

Salary & Compensation

Actual salary offers are based on various factors including experience, skills, and educational background. Explore our comprehensive benefits package available from day one.

Qualifications

3+ years of direct sales experience, preferably in B2B environments (Legal market experience preferred)

Proficiency in solution selling methodologies

Self-motivated with strong energy and drive

Excellent time and territory management skills

Demonstrated ability in product presentations

Home office capability with occasional travel requirements (Valid California Driver License and vehicle insurance required)

Education, Licenses, Certifications & Personal Affiliations

Bachelor's Degree Or Equivalent Professional Experience Required

Special Conditions for Employment

Background check required

Minimum age requirement: 18 years

Schedule

Monday to Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

To Apply

For more details and to apply, please visit our job portal.

Application Deadline: 8:50 p.m.

Employment Type: Full-Time
